name: seiscomp
description: A modern library for interacting with SeisComP. Runs everywhere.

scripts.build:docs: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-extras --customTitle seiscomp.js --footerLastModified --footerTypedocVersion --out docs src/index.ts src/modules/**/*.ts src/types/*.ts
scripts.prepublish: bun run clear && bun run build
scripts.postpublish: bun run deploy && npm version patch

author: blue <lyricalsoul@proton.me>
